sub_title: OSS Senior Expert, QA Lead at TEOCO
summary:
• OSS Senior Expert & Operation Expert:
- Expertise and experience with various OSS products and environments
- Experienced in leading  and monitoring the Production Environment
- Experienced in Improving and raising efficiency of monitoring production support
- Experienced in support customer users, QA and customer reps.
• QA lead/expert:
- Robust overall Expertise in all QA and testing activities on site and off shore 
- Experienced in documenting, planning, implementing and performing of all testing programs and actions
- Support and instruction of customer reps: Solutions Architect, Designers and UAT testers

education.field_of_study: Economics & Behavioral  sciences majored in Human Resources

profile_positions.description:
• As OSS Senior Operation Expert:
 - Monitoring the Production Environment
 - Improve and raising efficiency of existing production processes:
    > Designing and planning queries, scripts to improve the monitoring activities
    > Opening issues, cases and defects, analyzing, follow up and testing
    > "Cleaning", handling stacked processes, manually and automatically
    > Perform daily reports to KPN and Development Center
    > Support KPN users
    > Follow up and managing the production issues raised by the Customer 

As QA lead and OSS Expert:
• Perform high-level  & Release implementation testing activities on site
 - Writing Testing documentation, testing procedures
 - Planning and implementing of all testing programs and actions
 - Perform E2E testing, QA and UAT support on site
 - Support and instruction of customer reps: Solutions Architect, Designers and UAT testers
 - Planning and performing pipeline tests
• Managing all escalated issues by KPN reps (Solution Architect, Designers and testers), including analysis, follow up, communication with all parties, and testing. 
• Support QA activities occasionally to off shore (Development Center) site: 
 - Writing Testing documentation, testing procedures, test rules and test cases
 - Planning and implementing of all testing programs and actions
profile_positions.title: OSS Senior Expert, QA Lead, Onsite Operation Expert

profile_positions.description:
QA Lead and support on KPN B.V Customer site

• Perform high-level & Release implementation testing activities on site
  - Writing Testing documentation, testing procedures, test rules and test cases
  - Planning and implementing of all testing programs and actions
  - Perform E2E testing, QA and UAT support on site
  - Planning and performing pipeline tests
  - Support and instruction of customer reps: Solutions Architect, Designers, OSS operational
    and UAT testers
• Managing all escalated issues by KPN reps (OSS operational, Solution Architect, Designers and testers), including analysis, follow up, communication with all parties, and testing. 
• Support QA activities occasionally to off shore (Development Center) site: 
    - Writing Testing documentation, testing procedures, test rules and test cases
    -  Planning and implementing of all testing programs and actions
profile_positions.title: OSS Expert, QA Lead

profile_positions.description:
• Perform all testing activities on various OSS products in various projects: 
 - NetCap,  EWO, NetOrder
   (SW solutions for monitoring and tracking of networks, IP and telecommunication)
• Writing Testing documentation, FS and the testing procedures (STP, STD)
• Creating and writing of testing rules, testing cases
• Planning and implementing of all testing programs and actions
• Perform E2E testing, QA and UAT support on site to all products in various projects 
• Testing of a WEB based product – client and server sides
• Support and instruction of customers in land and abroad until ATP (e.g. BellSouth, H3G and more) 
• Participate in presale activities (POC) for SingTel off and on site (Singapore).
• Configuration management with “Rational”
• Fast learning and full view expert of all networks
profile_positions.title: QA Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Perform Language translation support to the web site Email Application
- Perform E2E testing & QA
